pr_title: Fixes #667 - Add support for missing labels in Directory searches

timeline.message: Fixes #667 - Add support for missing labels in Directory searches
Added parameter forSearch to buildSelector to differentiate the output depending on target use

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't  it be null != inputAttributes && null != inputAttributes.get(label) ?
Also you could merge the if and the else if blocks because they do the same.
timeline.author: ftence
